owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._destinationToken: Address of the token on the target chain
params._sourceToken: Address of the token on the current chain

setTokenDecimalsOnDestinationChain(addre.details: Used for handling decimal differences (e.g., USDT: 18 on BSC, 6 on other chains)

params._decimals: Decimals of the token on destination chains (e.g., 6 for USDT on non-BSC chains)
params._token: Address of the token on the current chain

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFundsToSourceChain(bytes,uint8,b.details: This function is used for both failed BTC and Rune requests

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByAdminV2(byte.details: Owner can only set the relayer fee percentage

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByOwnerOrAdmin.details: Owner can only set the relayer fee percentage

emergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Withdraws tokens in the emergency case

handleV3AcrossMessage(address,uint256,ad.notice: Process requests coming from Ethereum (using Across V3)

setTokenDecimalsOnDestinationChain(addre.notice: Setter for token decimals on destination chain

withdrawFundsToSourceChain(bytes,uint8,b.notice: Send back tokens to the source chain

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByAdminV2(byte.notice: Send back tokens to the source chain by owner

withdrawFundsToSourceChainByOwnerOrAdmin.notice: Send back tokens to the source chain by owner
